mapper.select: select count(*) from tb_project where status = 'Y'

select project_no , name owner , project_title , public_status , (select count(*) from tb_like l where l.member_no = 1 and project_no = p.project_no) "LIKE" , (select count(*) from tb_projectmember pm where pm.status = 1 and project_no = p.project_no) "COUNT" from tb_project p join tb_member on (owner_no = member_no) where p.status = 'Y' order by p.project_no desc

select count(*) from tb_project p join tb_member on (owner_no = member_no) where p.status = 'Y'
and project_title
and name
like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

select distinct p.project_no , mm.name owner , project_title , public_status , (select count(*) from tb_like l where l.member_no = #{memberNo} and project_no = p.project_no) "LIKE" , (select count(*) from tb_projectmember pm where pm.status = 1 and project_no = p.project_no) "COUNT" from tb_projectmember pm join tb_member m on (pm.member_no = m.member_no) right join tb_project p on (p.project_no = pm.project_no) join tb_member mm on (owner_no = mm.member_no) where p.status = 'Y'
and project_title
and mm.name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or m.name
like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' order by p.project_no desc

select count(*) from (select distinct p.project_no from tb_project p left join tb_projectmember pm on (p.project_no = pm.project_no) where owner_no = #{memberNo} or member_no = #{memberNo} and p.status = 'Y')

select distinct p.project_no , name owner , project_title , public_status , (select count(*) from tb_like l where l.member_no = 1 and project_no = p.project_no) "LIKE" , (select count(*) from tb_projectmember pm where pm.status = 1 and project_no = p.project_no) "COUNT" from tb_project p left join tb_projectmember pm on (p.project_no = pm.project_no) join tb_member m on (p.owner_no = m.member_no) where p.status = 'Y' and p.owner_no = #{memberNo} or pm.member_no = #{memberNo} order by p.project_no desc

select distinct project_no, owner from ( select distinct project_no, mm.name owner, m.name participant from tb_projectmember pm join tb_member m on (pm.member_no = m.member_no) join tb_project p using (project_no) join tb_member mm on (owner_no = mm.member_no) where p.status = 'Y' and owner_no = #{memberNo} or pm.member_no = #{memberNo} ) where participant like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or owner like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
